publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-233 Murdo Fraser: Return of Troops from Black Watch Regiment-That the Parliament welcomes the return of soldiers from the Black Watch Regiment to their base in Germany after their service during the conflict in Iraq; thanks them for their service to this country and the people of Iraq; appreciates their gesture to the people of Tayside and Fife in parading through towns in Angus, Perth and Kinross and Fife, and wishes them a well-deserved period of leave with their families.
S2M-233 Return of Troops from Black Watch Regiment (lodged on 23 July 2003) Phil Gallie*
S2M-233 Return of Troops from Black Watch Regiment (lodged on 23 July 2003) Mrs Nanette Milne*
